Text: I was able to activate Office 2013 in Windows 8 as long as I ran in Windows 7 Compatibility Mode and as an Administrator.

how do use it? I ran in win7 compatibility and as admin.. 1. choose office button. 2. install autoKMS 3. click ACTIVATE then it return=
ERROR TEXT: The Software Licensing Service reported that the license is not installed.


what to do?

You may have to manually add a license key. That's something I should've mentioned. I did that first, went into Office and added the key 2MNJP-QY9KX-MKBKM-9VFJ2-CJ9KK

That might be the difference you're looking for.
It doesn't work on Windows x64

It doesn't work on Win 7 x64 get this message ERROR TEXT: The Software Licensing Service reported that the license is not installed. I remove Office 13 and reinstall Office 2010 back and did not work on that either I have to use V 2.4 to install licensing file and it did work.  Install Licensing file is missing on this rev?
A copy of Microsoft Office 2013 Volume Licensing Edition should work with this KMS activator. By the time MS Office 2013 is properly released there should also be a proper toolkit.

A proper KMS activator for MS Office was released yesterday.

No need to download this toolkit.

this is my last upload 
thanks for all ur support mates
